events.title: DSC S25 Intro Social
events.description: Meet the board, learn about upcoming events, and connect with fellow data science enthusiasts at the Spring 2025 intro social.

events.title: Career Workshop
events.description: Get tips on resume building, interview preparation, and navigating the data science job market.

events.title: Data Cleaning Workshop
events.description: Learn how to clean and prepare data for analysis using Python and Pandas.

events.title: Breaking into ML Research - Maxwell Jones
events.description: Hear from Maxwell Jones (CMU PhD) on breaking into machine learning research and succeeding in the field.

events.title: MLOps in Industry: Naval Katoch, PPG
events.description: Learn about MLOps in industry from Naval Katoch (ML Ops Lead, PPG), drawing on 6+ years driving AI initiatives.

events.title: Inside Deep Research: Zhiqing Sun, OpenAI
events.description: Explore agentic AI systems and AI alignment with Zhiqing Sun (Research Lead, OpenAI Deep Research & CMU PhD).

events.title: Building the Future of the Terminal: Ian Hodge, Warp
events.description: Discover Warp's AI-powered terminal and startup insights from early engineer Ian Hodge (ex-Facebook).

events.title: Poker AI: Monte Carlo Workshop
events.description: Learn how to use Monte Carlo simulations to model complex systems and make informed decisions for the upcoming PokerAI competition!

events.title: Poker AI: Poker/Game Theory Workshop
events.description: Learn the basics of poker, game theory, and tips on where to start building your PokerAI bot!

events.title: PokerAI Competition Opener
events.description: Join us for the opening of our PokerAI competition! Compete against your peers to build the best poker-playing AI bot.

events.title: PokerAI: Reinforcement Learning Workshop
events.description: Learn about how to use reinforcement learning to build a poker-playing AI bot!
